By: tech capital December 25, 2019

Despite being over 10 years old, the Minecraft game is still being developed and updated. While the content updates for many games are released with so-called DLCs, content updates for Minecraft are and have always been free!

In our article we show you the most important innovations of version 1.15 and 1.15.1!

There is finally bees!

With the new version have now become official bees as new animals added to the game. You can similar to the other animals in Minecraft as well multiply or. breed.

Along with the bees also has the new Bee Nest Block get into the game. In this live the bees and sweep again and again return to this.
Of the Beehive Block works the same way. The only difference is that the player den beehive even manufacture can the bee nest only natural though generated can be.

A bee in the game Minecraft including the associated bee nest in the background!

These bee nests and associated bees are naturally grown in three biomes generated. The “flower forests”the “levels” and the “Sunflower Plains”. Unlike most other animals in Minecraft, which tend to be peaceful towards the player, bees can also attack the player. They always attack in a swarm, regardless of how many bees you have attacked.

The largest special feature here is that the bee after the sting of one player dies after a short time. The sting of a bee in Minecraft acts like poisoning and gradually deducts some life points from the player.

Two aggressive bees towards the player, which can be recognized by their red eyes.

Together with the bees there are the following new blocks and items:

  • bee nest
  • beehive
  • honey bottles
  • honeycomb
  • Bee Spawn Egg
  • honey block

Other minor changes

Next to the new bees there are still some minor changes at the game, which with Version 1.15 have been introduced. We show you the most important ones here:

  • Villagers lying in a bed can now be “awakened” or removed from the bed by right-clicking on the corresponding bed.
  • Slightly changed the texture of unemployed villagers.
  • Bells will now ring if activated by a redstone signal.
  • Campfires can now be extinguished with a shovel.
  • Composters have a new crafting recipe.
  • Iron Golems now have a damage model and can be repaired with iron.

That’s it! We hope you enjoyed the article! For more articles on exciting topics, you can also visit our Tech Capital main page!
